source:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Ul Thon wants to know Hagan Nee's whereabouts.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
リダ・ラーンのウル＝ゾンは、ハガン＝ニイの目撃場所を知りたいようだ。

source:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_SEQ_01<tab>According to the panicked pixie, Hagan Nee was being chased in the vicinity of Handmirror Lake. Despite being unable to fight, Ul Thon is resolved to help their distressed fellow, and together you set out on a rescue mission.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストには「<var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

ハガン＝ニイは、手鏡の湖の近くで魔物に追いかけられていたらしい。イル・メグのティム・グースで「ウル＝ゾン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_SEQ_02<tab>You arrive at the area where Hagan Nee was last seen. Scanning the area, Ul Thon hears a scream, and flies off towards the direction of the sound.
target: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_SEQ_02<tab>ウル＝ゾンは、ハガン＝ニイの悲鳴を聞いたらしい。ティム・グースで「ウル＝ゾン」を追いかけよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_SEQ_03<tab>By the edge of a cliff, you find Ul Thon standing between the monstrous fiend and its prey. Wasting no time, you hurl yourself into the fray and dispatch the creature. With the danger passed, you turn your attention to the pixies.
target: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_SEQ_03<tab>魔物に襲われていたハガン＝ニイを発見、魔物を討伐した。ティム・グースで「ウル＝ゾン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_SEQ_04<tab>Ul Thon uses healing magicks to tend the wounded Hagan Nee, who makes a swift recovery. The pixie expresses their gratitude to the both of you before heading back to Lydha Lran, and you follow shortly thereafter.
target: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_SEQ_04<tab>ハガン＝ニイは、礼を言って村に戻っていった。リダ・ラーンに戻って「ウル＝ゾン」と再度話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_SEQ_05<tab>Back at Lydha Lran, Ul Thon thanks you for giving them the courage to help their fellow. At that moment, Hagan Nee arrives in the company of other pixies. It would seem that the word of Ul Thon's deeds has swiftly spread, and the pixie has come to be held in highest regard. With that regard comes many requests, and Ul Thon finds themself not a little daunted, but the pixie promises to do their best to live up to the popularity that they had dreamed of.
target: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_SEQ_05<tab>ハガン＝ニイがウル＝ゾンの働きを村で触れ回ったことで、ピクシー族はウル＝ゾンを大きく見直したようだ。人気者となったウル＝ゾンには、たくさんの依頼が殺到。その量におののきながらも、人気者となったことに喜ぶウル＝ゾンだった。

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_000<tab>So, the field where you saw Hagan Nee─was it by Longmirror Lake?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_000<tab>どう、落ち着いた？
ハガン＝ニイを見つけた湖っていうのは、
姿見の湖のことかしら？

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_PIXIEC03406_000_001<tab>(-Panicked Pixie-)No, the other one─Handmirror Lake. You'll help us, won't you, mortal?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_PIXIEC03406_000_001<tab>(-焦った様子のピクシー族-)いや……手鏡の湖の方さ！
湖の手前の花畑を飛んでいたよ。
旅人さん、お願い！　助けてあげて！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_A2_000_000<tab>I can't do this without Ul Thon.
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_005<tab>Wait, I'm coming with you! I'm scared, if truth be told...but a pixie who protects their fellows is a popular pixie!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_005<tab>待って、私も一緒に行くわ！
怖いけど、郷の仲間を守れてこそ真の人気者だもの……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_010<tab>B-But I can't fight or anything. What good am I to you? And yet...a pixie who protects their fellows is a popular pixie!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_010<tab>えっ、私なんて、大した力も……。
……ううん、そうじゃないわよね。
郷の仲間を守れてこそ、真の人気者だもの……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_015<tab>You'd forsake us in our time of need!? Oh, forget you, then! I'll go and rescue Hagan Nee alone!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_015<tab>そ、そんな言い方ヒドイ！
なら、私がひとりで助けに行くわ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_016<tab>...Ahhh! I see what you're doing, you sly mortal! You want to tell me that a pixie who protects their fellows is a popular pixie, isn't that right?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_016<tab>……ハッ、さては、今の言葉は本心じゃないわね？
仲間を救うために動けてこそ、真の人気者になれると、
そう、私に教えてくれたのね！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_PIXIEC03406_000_017<tab>(-Panicked Pixie-)Be that as it may, it's too dangerous by yourself! The two of you should go together!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_PIXIEC03406_000_017<tab>(-焦った様子のピクシー族-)そ、それもそうかも知れないけど……
ウル＝ゾンひとりで向かうのは無茶だよ～！
ふたりで一緒に行ったらいいんじゃないかなっ？

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_100_020<tab>Right, we'll take care of this! You two, wait in the village!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_100_020<tab>よし……！　ここは私たちに任せておきなさい！
アナタたちは、村で待機していて！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_020<tab>Handmirror Lake lies to the northwest. Let's hurry there and look for Hagan Nee!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_020<tab>それじゃ、ハガン＝ニイを助けにいきましょう！
手鏡の湖の手前ね……北西の方角に向かうわよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_030<tab>This should be the spot, but Hagan Nee doesn't seem to be here anymore... I'll try calling out.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_030<tab>ハガン＝ニイが追いかけられていたのは、この辺りね。
もう、この周辺にはいないかしら……。
試しに、呼びかけてみましょう。

TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_031<tab>ハガン＝ニイ～～！！！
何処に行っちゃったの～～！！！

TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_032<tab>うーん、返事はないわね。
こうなったら、徹底的に捜索を……って、あら……？

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_033<tab>Did you hear that!? It was a scream, and it came from over there! Come on!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_033<tab>…………！！
いま、かすかだけど悲鳴が聞こえたわ！
北西の方よ！

TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_060<tab>大変、怪我してる……！
逃げ切れなくなって、魔物にやられちゃったのね。

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_061<tab>I know some simple healing spells. I'll see what I can do.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_061<tab>私、簡単な癒しの術なら使えるわ。
ハガン＝ニイを……郷の仲間を癒してみせる！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_HAGANNEE_000_062<tab>A-Amazing! I feel like a new pixie! Ul Thon, I didn't know you could heal so well!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_HAGANNEE_000_062<tab>おっ……おおおお！
すごい！　すごいよ、ウル＝ゾン！
キミのおかげで、すっかり全快だよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_HAGANNEE_000_063<tab>I went to pick a flower, but it turned out to be that fiend's head. If it weren't for you, I would be a dead pixie.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_HAGANNEE_000_063<tab>いやあ、ありがとう！
花だと思って近づいたら、ヤツの頭だったのさ！
ウル＝ゾンのおかげで、助かったよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_064<tab>I merely tended your wounds. It was this mortal here who saved you from the beast.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_064<tab>私は、必死に癒しの術を使っただけ。
旅人さんがいなかったら、アナタを助け出せなかったわ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_HAGANNEE_000_065<tab>Well then, I'm in both your debts! Thank you!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_HAGANNEE_000_065<tab>じゃあ、ふたり両方にありがとうだね！
この恩は絶対に忘れないからさっ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_066<tab>Heh, it's a fine feeling to be thanked... Come, we should head back to Lydha Lran as well.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_066<tab>お礼を言われるって、とても嬉しくてむず痒いものね！
さあ、私たちもリダ・ラーンに戻りましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_070<tab>As much as I want to become popular, I never could've braved such dangers alone. Thank you for giving me the courage.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_070<tab>仲間を助けに、郷を飛び出すなんて……
人気者になりたい一心とはいえ、ひとりじゃ無理だったわ！
アナタが勇気をくれたおかげよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_071<tab>Of course, the most important thing is Hagan Nee is safe. And now we can return to the business of making me popular...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_071<tab>不安だったし、とても怖かったけど、
ハガン＝ニイを助けられて、本当に良かった！
それじゃ、また人気者になるために……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_HAGANNEE_000_073<tab>(-Hagan Nee-)I went and told everyone how you helped me. And now everyone wants you to help them too!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_HAGANNEE_000_073<tab>(-ハガン＝ニイ-)ウル＝ゾンに助けてもらったこと、みんなに伝えたんだ！
そしたら、癒しの術をかけてほしいってコや、
魔物がいる場所から花を取ってきてほしいってコが殺到してさ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_HAGANNEE_000_074<tab>(-Hagan Nee-)Some are hurt and need healing. Others need a hand harvesting plants in dangerous places. And what's this we hear about you gifting flowers to everyone?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_HAGANNEE_000_074<tab>(-ハガン＝ニイ-)だから、こうして連れてきたんだ！
それにキミ、みんなに花を配ってあげるんだって？
はやく花がほしいってコも、たくさんキミを待ってるよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_075<tab>Oh! Of...of course! I'll take care of everyone in turn. The healing, the harvesting, the gifts─everything!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_075<tab>えっ、えっと……！
植物の調達に、癒しの術に、花束……
わ、わかったわ！　順番にやってあげるから待っててと伝えて！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_HAGANNEE_000_076<tab>(-Hagan Nee-)Great! We'll leave you to it, then!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_HAGANNEE_000_076<tab>(-ハガン＝ニイ-)わかったよ！
みんな、キミにお願いしたい事があるみたいだからさ。
がんばってね～！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_077<tab>To have everyone depend on you... This is what it means to be popular. Ahhh, the feeling is even more wonderful than I imagined!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_077<tab>今のが、人気者になるということなのね！
みんなが私を必要として……素晴らしい気分だわ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_078<tab>But ugh... In my glee, I didn't stop to consider how much work it will be. Looks like I'll be busy for a while...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_078<tab>でも、どうしましょう……。
お願いされるのが嬉しくって、全部引き受けちゃったけど、
最後までこなすのに、どのくらいかかるのかしら……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_079<tab>You're popular too, yes? Lots of people depend on you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_079<tab>……そういえば、旅人さんも、
私だけじゃなく、いろんなヒトに頼りにされてるのよね？

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_080<tab>Tell me, what is it like? Is it tough to have everyone needing something from you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_080<tab>もしかして、
みんなの人気者になって頼りにされるのって……
かなり、大変なのかしら？

source: TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_081<tab>Gah, I should've known it's not all milk and honey... But this is what I've dreamed of, and I promise to do my best to live up to it!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZC104_03407_ULTHON_000_081<tab>うわあ、人気者も大変なのね！
でも、自分で望んだことだもの……私、がんばるわね！
